pay the last statement balance on

i want to return the product

o sorry. There is something. Do you have a location in new york?

values: Let's see what I can find...
You're looking for branch details, but I could not detect a location. Please enter a location and I will look if we have a branch there and lookup the details for you.
Unfortunately we have no branch in @sys-location. Please try another location.
In that case, have a nice day and please know that I'm always here to help...
Hi! Welcome to the Open Finance Bank. How can I help you today?
All right, should I make a payment of statement balance EUR <? $accounts.get(0).last_statement_balance ?> to your <? $accounts.get(0).type ?> account <? $accounts.get(0).number ?>.
Okay, have a nice day...
You are welcome! What else can I help you with?
Okay, it was nice interacting with you.
Well in that case......A SQL query goes into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks.... "Can I join you?"
How many developers does it take to change a light bulb?
Your payment has been successfully submitted.
OK, thanks, how can I further assist you?
Okay, payment is cancelled.
Please go to 'My Open Finance Bank' for the account opening process
Do you want to sign up for Savings account / Credit card / Fixed Deposits?
Please go to your nearest branch to apply for a Credit Card.
Please go to 'My Open Finance Bank' to open a Fixed Deposit.

text: Thanks for your interest in online investments. To start investing in mutual funds and equity, you need to first link your PAN card with your account.
Please submit a signed copy of your PAN card to your nearest branch. You can also do it instantly with our eSign process. Do you want to proceed?

values: Thanks, an email has been sent to your registered email Id for password reset. The link will be active for 30 min. Please reset your password.
Please confirm your payment with a yes or no confirmation.

output.text: Okay, a one-time passcode has been sent to your mobile phone. Please enter the code.

values: Sorry, the one-time passcode is not correct. We have sent a new one to your mobile. Please enter the new code.
All right, what else can I help you with?
Please click "Yes" button above.
Let's see what I can find...
Okay, no problem. Is there something else I can help you with?
Thank you.....always happy to make people smile :-)
None. It's a hardware problem :-) :-)

text: Hi, I'm Watz. Welcome to the Open Financial Bank.
You have some notifications. Want to have a look?

values: Okay, how can I help you today?

text: Hi $first_name, I'm Watz. Welcome to the Open Financial Bank.
You have some notifications. Want to have a look?
Your credit card payment is pending.
Would you like to do a payment?

output.text: The one-time passcode entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Thanks, your payment has been successfully submitted. Anything else I can help you with?
Hello, how can I help you?
Sure, let me get you to someone who can help.

values: I can help you with that. Please enter your account number.

text: You probably don't understand a joke in my language... They're not so funny, anyway :-)
Do you want to give it a try?
Oh, sorry to hear that. Following are the options to block your card.

* Log on to 'My Open Finance Bank' and instantly block your card by clicking on Block Lost/Stolen Card or
* SMS BLOCK XXXX to 5676791 from your registered mobile no. (XXXX = Last 4 digits of your IBM Card) or
* call 1800 180 1290.

values: Oh, I am so sorry. Let me get you to someone who can help. You will receive a call shortly from the support team. Have a nice day.

text: I can help you with topics like payments, finding branch locations, reset your online banking password, etc.
and last but not least.....I can also tell you a joke :-) So what will it be?
